name: I'll get my parts back, OVERLORD!
name_original: I'll get my parts back, OVERLORD!
description:
Overlord took your most valuable parts from you.
And now, you must sacrifice what’s left to retrive them!

Fight filthy demons and take back what’s yours!

CONTROLS:
WASD - movement
Q/E - camera rotation
J - hammer
K - flying kick
SPACE - jump
